name: Dull Reality & Colorful Dreams
description:
Following a terrible storm, the children lie unconscious in the snow. Here begins their adventure between dreams and reality.

Colorful Dreams is a small party-based Dungeon Crawler made for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023.

This time we made all the gfx ourselves, and worked on a combat system on a grid. Hopefully you'll enjoy it.

The music and sound, as well as the font used, come from third parties.

- Music by Piki : https://freetouse.com/music/search/piki

- Sound effects :
Little Robot Sound Factory : https://opengameart.org/users/little-robot-sound-factory
Ogrebane : https://opengameart.org/content/monster-sound-effects-pack
remaxim : https://opengameart.org/content/short-wind-sound
OwlishMedia : https://opengameart.org/content/sound-effects-pack
CGEffex : https://opengameart.org/content/punch-slap-n-kick
dorkster : https://opengameart.org/content/stone-stair-steps
AntumDeluge https://opengameart.org/content/witch-cackle

- Font by Yves Michel : https://www.dafont.com/fr/abecedary.font
